holidays.title: Malta Republic Day
holidays.description: Join us as we focus on Maltese freedom as an independent country.

holidays.title: National Cocoa Day
holidays.description: Join us in discovering why cocoa is so well-loved worldwide, and why all things chocolate excite us.

holidays.title: National Cream Cheese Frosting Day
holidays.description: Let's indulge in some delicious cream cheese frosting to whet our appetites.

holidays.title: National Horse Day
holidays.description: It's a day to remember the economic, historic, and cultural contributions that horses have made.

holidays.title: National Violin Day
holidays.description: Violins have a sound easily adaptable to a variety of musical genres.

holidays.title: Pick A Pathologist Pal Day
holidays.description: Let’s look at how pathologists diagnose disease — analyzing tissue, cell, and body fluid samples.

holidays.title: St. Lucia National Day
holidays.description: St. Lucia National Day falls on December 13, marking the Feast Day of Saint Lucia.

holidays.title: U.S. National Guard Birthday
holidays.description: Take time to honor those who have protected our country for centuries.

holidays.title: Taylor Swift’s Birthday
holidays.description: "Swifties" all over the globe are going crazy celebrating their love for their favorite pop star.

holidays.title: Amy Lee’s Birthday
holidays.description: As the soaring voice of her generation, this talented singer wastes no time in grabbing opportunities.

holidays.title: Dermot Kennedy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Irish singer and songwriter rose to prominence with his 2019 single, ‘Outnumbered.’

holidays.title: Dick Van Dyke’s Birthday
holidays.description: With over seven decades in Hollywood, we must admit that we enjoyed every moment.

holidays.title: Dorinda Medley’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality star and philanthropist is one of the most beloved figures in Hollywood.

holidays.title: Ella Baker’s Birthday
holidays.description: She lived her life for the advancement of others and was at every scene of liberation.

holidays.title: Emma Corrin’s Birthday
holidays.description: The world has always been a stage for Emma Corrin, even when she was young.

holidays.title: Harry Raftus’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nothing in the world can stop this charismatic guy who wins more fans every day!

holidays.title: Jamie Foxx’s Birthday
holidays.description: From class-clown to Oscar-winning actor: discover the eventful journey of the confident Jamie Foxx.

holidays.title: Jasmine Mir’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jasmine Mir began her social media journey at 10, and she hasn't looked back since.

holidays.title: M. Maggie Miller’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented singer-songwriter continues to receive massive acclaim for her successful collaborations.

holidays.title: Maisy Stella’s Birthday
holidays.description: Maisy started out at a young age but her talent is paving the way for her.

holidays.title: Matt Ox’s Birthday
holidays.description: He started writing rap songs at five and is one of the youngest rappers today!

holidays.title: Morris Day’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented artist has been making music that resounds with every upcoming generation.

holidays.title: NeNe Leakes’s Birthday
holidays.description: Witty, energetic, and always ready with a sassy comeback, there’s no limit to Leakes’ entertainment potential.

holidays.title: Stampy’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this multi-talented artist and award-winning YouTuber, everything is achievable! Learn more about him today!

holidays.title: Steve Buscemi’s Birthday
holidays.description: With his edgy performances, Steve Buscemi has made a mark on the film industry.

holidays.title: Tanya Sam’s Birthday
holidays.description: After graduating, she worked as a nurse for over 10 years in various top hospitals.

holidays.title: Ted Nugent’s Birthday
holidays.description: Get a close look at the man behind ‘Cat Scratch Fever’ and other classic hits.

holidays.title: Tom DeLonge’s Birthday
holidays.description: Few artists influenced the 1990s and 2000s as much as Tom DeLonge and his unique voice.
